description: Defines a Backbone.js view for individual todo items, handling rendering, events, and model interactions in a TodoMVC application.

classes.name: TodoView
classes.description: A Backbone view representing a single todo item, managing its rendering and user interactions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Sets up event listeners for model changes, destruction, and visibility.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the todo item using the template and updates its visual state.

methods.name: toggleVisible
methods.description: Shows or hides the todo item based on its completion status and current filter.

methods.name: isHidden
methods.description: Determines if the todo item should be hidden based on filter and completion status.

methods.name: toggleCompleted
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of the model.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Enters editing mode for the todo item.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Saves changes or deletes the todo if the input is empty, and exits editing mode.

methods.name: updateOnEnter
methods.description: Handles the Enter key to save edits.

methods.name: revertOnEscape
methods.description: Handles the Escape key to cancel editing and revert changes.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Deletes the model and removes the view.
